channel.name: Y5_Billing_To_Smart_Salem_Notification
channel.description: Send notification to smart salem application whenever bill is created.

properties.select: SELECT bm.billmasterid,bm.mrno AS mrno, bm.billedbyname AS staffname, COALESCE(NULLIF(bd.packagename, null), 'NA') AS wellnesspackagename, COALESCE(NULLIF(bd.pkgamount, null), 0) AS packageamount, (pd.mobilephonecode || pd.mobilephone) AS clientmobile, pd.personalemail AS clientemail, NULL AS campaigncode, NULL AS promotioncode FROM billmaster bm JOIN billdetails bd ON bm.billmasterid = bd.billmasterid JOIN patdemographics pd ON bm.patdemographicsid = pd.patdemographicsid LEFT JOIN smartsalemlog ssl ON bm.billmasterid = ssl.billmasterid WHERE ssl.billmasterid IS NULL AND DATE(bm.billdate) >= '2022-10-01' ORDER BY bm.billdate DESC LIMIT 10;

properties.query: INSERT INTO smartsalemlog ( mrno, wellnesspackagename, clientmobile, clientemail, packageamount, campaigncode, promotioncode, staffname, sentflag, sentdate, billmasterid) VALUES (${mrn}, ${wellnessPackageName}, ${clientMobile}, ${clientEmail}, ${packageAmount}::numeric, -- Cast packageAmount to numeric ${campaginCode}, ${promotionCode}, ${staffName}, 1, NOW(), ${billmasterid}::numeric -- Cast packageAmount to numeric );
